CustomField.description: The state in which the kanban card was left after the last saved.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the state in which the kanban card was left after the last saved. Possible values include 'inzone', 'nozone' or 'inzone-rejectconfirm' (i.e. user put card in a zone but did not allow business rules to run)
CustomField.label: State
